paper_title.en: Benzoyl phloroglucinol derivatives from Hypericum scabrum

description.en: The ethyl acetate soluble extract of the dried roots of Ferula penninervis gave 17 new sesquiterpenes [15 of the guaiane-type, ferupennins A-O (1-15), and two of the eudesmane-type, 1alpha-hydroxy-2-oxo-5alpha,7beta,-11betaH-eudesm-3-en-6alpha,12-olide (16) and penninervin (17)] and nine known sesquiterpenes. The structures of the new compounds were elucidated on the basis of spectroscopic evidence and X-ray analysis. The absolute configuration of ferupennin A (1) was determined by a modified Mosher method.

The ethyl acetate-soluble fraction from a methanol extract of Ferula foetida has afforded six new sulfide derivatives, (E)-3-methylsulfinyl-2-propenyl sec-butyl disulfide (foetisulfide A) (1), (Z)-3-methylsulfinyloxy-2-propenyl see-butyl disulfide (foetisulfide 13) (2), (E)-3-methylsulfinyloxy-2-propenyl sec-butyl disulfide (foetisulfide C) (3), bis(3-methylthio-2E-propenyl) disulfide (foetisulfide D) (4), 3,4,5-trimethyl-2-thiophenecarboxylic acid (foetithiophene A) (5), 3,4,5-trimethyl-2-(methylsulfinyloxymethyl)thiophene (foetithiophene B) (6), along with six known compounds. The structures of 1-6 were established on the basis of spectroscopic studies, with the elucidation of 5 confirmed by single-crystal X-ray crystallography.

paper_title.en: An unusual sesquiterpene derivative from Ferula kuhistanica

description.en: An unusual new sesquiterpene derivative, kuhistaferone (1), was isolated from the fruits of the Uzbekistan medicinal plant Ferula kuhistanica. The structure of 1 was established on the basis of spectroscopic evidence. Compound 1 showed moderate cytotoxicity against the human colon tumor cell line HCT116.

paper_title.ja: A New Megastigmane Glucoside from Phlomis spinidens :
paper_title.en: A New Megastigmane Glucoside from Phlomis spinidens

description.ja: A new megastigmane glucoside, phlomisionoside (1) was isolated from the aerial parts of Phlomis spinidens and the structure was elucidated by spectroscopic and chemical analyses.
description.en: A new megastigmane glucoside, phlomisionoside (1) was isolated from the aerial parts of Phlomis spinidens and the structure was elucidated by spectroscopic and chemical analyses.

A bis-sesquiterpene and sesquiterpenolides from Inula macrophylla

description.en: Macrophyllidimer C, a novel bis-sesquiterpene, in which the two sesquiterpene units are directly connected by a C-C bond, and eight other sesquiterpenolides were obtained from the bark of Inula macrophylla. Seven of these, macrophyllilactones A-G, are new eudesmanolide and elemanolide-type sesquiterpenes, Their structures were determined on the basis of spectroscopic evidence and chemical reaction. (C), 2001 Published by Elsevier Science Ltd.

paper_title.en: A bis-sesquiterpene and sesquiterpenolides from Inula macrophylla

description.en: Macrophyllidimer C, a novel bis-sesquiterpene, in which the two sesquiterpene units are directly connected by a C-C bond, and eight other sesquiterpenolides were obtained from the bark of Inula macrophylla. Seven of these, macrophyllilactones A-G, are new eudesmanolide and elemanolide-type sesquiterpenes, Their structures were determined on the basis of spectroscopic evidence and chemical reaction. (C), 2001 Published by Elsevier Science Ltd.

paper_title.en: Sesquiterpenoids from the fruits of Ferula kuhistanica and antibacterial activity of the constituents of F.-kuhistanica

description.en: Ethyl acetate extracts of the air-dried fruits of Ferula kuhistanica afforded three daucane esters: kuhistanicaol H, I and J, together with nine other known compounds. Their structures were established on the basis of spectroscopic evidence. Isolated compounds in this paper and previously reported compounds from the roots and stems of F. kuhistanica were tested for antibacterial activity. Some of them were selectively toxic against Gram-positive bacteria, including methicillin-sensitive and methicillin- resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MSSA and MRSA). (C) 2001 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Sesquiterpenoids from the fruits of Ferula kuhistanica and antibacterial activity of the constituents of F.-kuhistanica

paper_title.en: A new neoclerodane diterpenoid from Scutellaria hematochlora

description.en: From the aerial parts of Scutellaria hematochlora, a new neoclerodane diterpenoid, hematachloridin (1) was isolated together with acetovanillon, vanillin, apigenin and sitosterol 3-O-glucoside. The structure of the new compound was elucidated by spectral analyses.

paper_title.en: A new neoclerodane diterpenoid from Scutellaria hematochlora

description.en: From the aerial parts of Scutellaria hematochlora, a new neoclerodane diterpenoid, hematachloridin (1) was isolated together with acetovanillon, vanillin, apigenin and sitosterol 3-O-glucoside. The structure of the new compound was elucidated by spectral analyses.

paper_title.en: Traditional medicine in Turkey X. Folk medicine in Central Anatolia

description.en: Traditional medicine used in Central Anatolia; Ankara, Kayseri, Nigde and south-eastern parts of Karaman and Konya provinces have been studied. Two hundred and ninety one folk remedies obtained from 103 plant species belonging to 40 families and 4 animal species are reported with their vernacular names, parts used, methods of preparing remedies and therapeutic usage. (C) 2001 Elsevier Science Ireland Ltd. All rights reserved.
